content: Hello, I am trying to slice an element in Forge that is already a slice. When I try to specify the type and path of a discriminator, the drop down menu for the path is empty. Is this an error in Forge?

Hi @Ana Kostadinovska, the drop down is just a list of suggested values. However you can also type in a custom path expression. If the list is empty, Forge probably isn't smart enough to generate useful suggestions. It certainly does NOT imply that your profile is invalid.

No prob, just let me know if you need any more assistance.
BTW I notice that I liked my own message - fat fingers
